game.description: The Dark Sorcerer's Tower is said to be filled with treasures and ancient knowledge. However, it's also rumored to be cursed, causing many brave adventurers who have ventured inside never to return.
game.objective: Reach the top floor of the tower and defeat the dark sorcerer.

tasks.description: Find the hidden entrance to the tower.
tasks.location: The old ruins near the village
tasks.objective: Locate and unlock the secret door

tasks.description: Navigate through the tower's first floor and reach the staircase leading up.
tasks.objective: Find the hidden passage to the next floor

tasks.description: Defeat the dark sorcerer in combat.
tasks.objective: Overpower the dark sorcerer using your skills and abilities

game.title: The Lost Treasure of the Dark Sorcerer's Tower
